moves.1. e4:
FALKBEER COUNTER-GAMBIT

White claims the center and opens lines for the King's Bishop and Queen
moves.1... e5: The most popular answer to the King's opening, since this movement keep certain simmetry in the center, which is possitive for the black side
moves.2. f4: White  response with a King's Gambit. It sacrificies his f pawn to launch a quick attack on the black king. The problem is that when his attack is over, his defence turns weak.
moves.2... d5: Falkbeer Counter-Gambit: I love this response for blacks, because it allows to get out both bishops
moves.3... exf4: Until this move, things flow as usual
moves.4. Nf3: Now, the game has turned into Abbazia defence, modern variation, which (IMAO) it offers a wider range of oportunities for the black side than for the white one
moves.4... Nf6: Now, there is several ways to follow the gambit properly, I chose this variant to go on the attack, though perhaps the more logical way of doing it would be e4 or even c6
moves.5. c4: White likes to protect his doubled pawn. Besides, he opens a way to get out his Queen and menace blacks' King
moves.5... c6: Now black decides follow with Marshall/Nimzowitsch Counter-Gambi offering another pawn and covering the King from the Queen menace
moves.6. dxc6: White break his doubled pawn column and opens a wide area in black pawns line
moves.6... Nxc6: Of course this is the most natural response, since if bxc6, black leaves a pawn without any effective defence
moves.8. Bd2: Bd2! White tried to defence. He could choose among this movement or Nc3.
moves.10. O-O: 0-0! IMAO, This is the best way to get rid of annoying Black pieces.
moves.10... O-O: Okay, I had a doubt here, I wasn't sure if 0-0 or 0-0-0. I felt more weakness in the other side, so I got the short one. It is true that this one, doesn't allow me to be more agressive on attack...
moves.11. Bxb4: Bxb4. Perhaps the white side should have continued with d5
moves.11... Qxb4: Now, the final attack is served
moves.14... b5: Ok, this movement is a tricky one, but wheather White realised or not, Black side still has huge chances to punish the white defence
